net.sf.mmm.util.query.api

Interface Command

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DeleteStatement<E,SELF>, InsertStatement<E,SELF>, JpqlDeleteStatement<E>, JpqlSelectStatement<E>, JpqlUpdateStatement<E>, ListQuery<E>, ModifyStatement<E,SELF>, NumberQuery<E>, OrientDbDeleteStatement<E>, OrientDbInsertStatement<E>, OrientDbSelectStatement<E>, OrientDbUpdateStatement<E>, Query<E>, SelectStatement<E,SELF>, SingleQuery<E>, Statement<E,SELF>, StoreStatement<E,SELF>, UpdateStatement<E,SELF>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDeleteStatement, AbstractInsertStatement, AbstractModifyStatement, AbstractSelectStatement, AbstractStatement, AbstractStoreStatement, AbstractUpdateStatement, JpqlDeleteStatementImpl, JpqlSelectStatementImpl, JpqlUpdateStatementImpl, ListQueryImpl, NumberQueryImpl, OrientDbDeleteStatementImpl, OrientDbInsertStatementImpl, OrientDbSelectStatementImpl, OrientDbUpdateStatementImpl, QueryImpl, SingleQueryImpl

    public interface Command
    This is the abstract interface of a Command that can be executed against a database as SQL. It is either a Query or a Statement.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getSql() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSql

        String getSql()
        Returns:
        the current SQL String of this Command. In case of a Statement it may only be an SQL fragment as the final operation such as FeatureFetch.fetch() will complete the statement.
